abstract: Under the terms of the settlement, Mr. Hurd will give up thousands of restricted stock units granted to him while he served as H.P.’s chief executive.
snippet: Under the terms of the settlement, Mr. Hurd will give up thousands of restricted stock units granted to him while he served as H.P.’s chief executive.
lead_paragraph: 5:32 p.m. | Updated Hewlett-Packard and Oracle said Monday that  a lawsuit over the latter’s hiring of Mark V. Hurd, the former H.P. executive who was ousted amid a scandal involving a former actress, had been settled.

headline.main: H.P. and Oracle Settle Lawsuit Over Hiring of Hurd

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
